briefTitle: Multi-catheter High Dose Rate (HDR) Breast Brachytherapy
officialTitle: A UW Phase II Trial of Multi-catheter HDR Brachytherapy Following Lumpectomy for Early Stage Breast Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: To Determine if Brachytherapy Will Produce Non-inferior Local Regional Control at 5 Years Post Treatment When Compared to Historical Results of Conventional XRT
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Invasive breast cancer or DCIS, tumor stage of Tis, T1, T2 if lesion is \< 3 cm, N0 or N1 if 1-3 + nodes with no extracapsular extension
